item.title: Portfolio
item.description: Work in progress! In the mean time, why not check out some of my Github projects? https://github.com/Zenrix/bytelo Top down 2D shooter made with Lua and LOVE https://github.com/Zenrix/roque Framework for making roguelike games on the web https://github.com/Zenrix/r-lyke A tiny roguelike written in Ruby

item.title: Resume
item.description: Micheal Earl Arcata, California, United States michealearldev@gmail.com linkedin.com/in/micheal-earl Summary I am driven to learn new technologies and deep dive into what makes them tick. I have 2 years of web development experience, a decade of tinkering under my belt, and I am proficient in all areas of web development with a focus on the back end. I have used many ORM’s, databases, and server languages. My preferences are Node.
